net.datacrow.core.console

Interface IGroupingPane


  • public interface IGroupingPane
    Interface defining a Grouping Pane.
    Author:
    Robert Jan van der Waals

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(DcObject dco)
      Adds the item to the Grouping Pane and its tree panels (ITreePanel).
      void applySettings()
      Apply the user / system settings.
      void clear()
      Clears the grouping pane and the view of which this pane is a part.
      ITreePanel getCurrent()
      Retrieves the currently selected ITreePanel
      IMasterView getView()
      Returns the view of which the grouping pane is part.
      void groupBy()
      Applies the grouping.
      boolean isEnabled()
      Indicates whether the grouping pane is enabled.
      boolean isLoaded()
      Indicates whether the grouping pane has been loaded
      boolean isVisible()
      Indicates whether the Grouping Pane is visible.
      void load()
      Loads the view of which this grouping pane is part.
      void remove(java.lang.String key)
      Removes the item with the specified key from the grouping pane and IView.
      void saveChanges(boolean b)
      Indicates whether changes should be saved when changing the view.
      void setFont(java.awt.Font font)
      Applies the font to the Grouping Pane and its tree panels (ITreePanel).
      void setVisible(boolean b)
      Makes the Grouping Pane visible / invisible
      void sort()
      Sorts the items in the view of which this pane is a part.
      void update(DcObject dco)
      Updates the Grouping Pane and its tree panels (ITreePanel) with the item information.
      void updateTreeNodes(DcObject dco)
      Update the tree with the item information.
      void updateView()
      Update the current view.

    • Method Detail

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled()
        Indicates whether the grouping pane is enabled.
        Returns:
        enabled y/n.

      • updateView

        void updateView()
        Update the current view.
        See Also:
        IView

      • groupBy

        void groupBy()
        Applies the grouping.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears the grouping pane and the view of which this pane is a part.

      • sort

        void sort()
        Sorts the items in the view of which this pane is a part.

      • updateTreeNodes

        void updateTreeNodes(DcObject dco)
        Update the tree with the item information.
        Parameters:
        dco - the item to reflect in the grouping pane / tree.

      • load

        void load()
        Loads the view of which this grouping pane is part.

      • applySettings

        void applySettings()
        Apply the user / system settings. The settings are applied on every ITreePanel.

      • saveChanges

        void saveChanges(boolean b)
        Indicates whether changes should be saved when changing the view. As a new node is selected, the view is cleared. In case the view contains items which have been changed (but not yet saved) these will be saved depending on this setting.
        Parameters:
        b - save changes y/n

      • isLoaded

        boolean isLoaded()
        Indicates whether the grouping pane has been loaded
        Returns:
        loaded y/n

      • remove

        void remove(java.lang.String key)
        Removes the item with the specified key from the grouping pane and IView. The item is removed from every ITreePanel.
        Parameters:
        key - the item ID.

      • update

        void update(DcObject dco)
        Updates the Grouping Pane and its tree panels (ITreePanel) with the item information.
        Parameters:
        dco - the item to use for the update.

      • add

        void add(DcObject dco)
        Adds the item to the Grouping Pane and its tree panels (ITreePanel).
        Parameters:
        dco - the item to add.

      • isVisible

        boolean isVisible()
        Indicates whether the Grouping Pane is visible.
        Returns:
        visible y/n

      • setVisible

        void setVisible(boolean b)
        Makes the Grouping Pane visible / invisible
        Parameters:
        b - visible y/n

      • setFont

        void setFont(java.awt.Font font)
        Applies the font to the Grouping Pane and its tree panels (ITreePanel).
        Parameters:
        font - the font to use.

      • getView

        IMasterView getView()
        Returns the view of which the grouping pane is part.
        Returns:
        the master view

      • getCurrent

        ITreePanel getCurrent()
        Retrieves the currently selected ITreePanel
        Returns:
        the current tree panel
